mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE posttitle LIKE '%'||#{postTitle}||'%' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

select B.rnum as rnum , B.postNo as postNo, B.postType as postType, B.userNo as userNo, B.courseNo as courseNo, B.regDate as regDate, B.communityNo as communityNo, B.scheduleNo as scheduleNo, B.postTitle as postTitle, B.postContent as postContent, B.hit as hit, B.category as category, B.userName as userName from(select rownum as rnum, A.postNo, A.postType, A.userNo, A.courseNo, A.regDate, A.communityNo, A.scheduleNo, A.postTitle, A.postContent, A.hit, A.category, A.userName from (SELECT p.postNo, p.postType, u.userNo, p.courseNo, TO_CHAR(p.regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate, p.communityNo, p.scheduleNo, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.hit, p.category, u.userName FROM post p join users u ON p.userNo = u.userNo where p.postType = 1 order by postNo desc ) A where rownum <= #{pageNo2} ) B where B.rnum >= #{pageNo1}
select count(*) from post where postType= 1
select postNo, postTitle, postContent, hit, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate, userNo, category from post where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.update: update post set postTitle=#{postTitle}, category=#{category}, postContent=#{postContent}, regDate=sysdate where postNo=#{postNo} and userNo = #{userNo}
